Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

-- Populate the Brick Color, Vertex Color table, eww -- Maybe not, it might be better to temporarily just convert the character meshes safely and bring them back
local Tool = script.Parent local Potion = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local minRange = 2 local maxRange = 200
local childScript local changeTo
local drinkAnim
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Potion.Position).unit
local hit = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(Potion.Position + direction * minRange, direction * maxRange), vCharacter)
drinkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.DrinkAnim) if drinkAnim then drinkAnim:Play() end Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) wait(1.5) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -0.5, 0) Potion.Transparency = 1.0 if hit then if mouse then local surface = mouse.TargetSurface end childScript = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("ChangeFormScript") if childScript == nil then childScript = script.ChangeFormScript:Clone() childScript.Parent = vCharacter end
changeTo = childScript:FindFirstChild("ChangeTo") if changeTo then changeTo.Value = hit if childScript.Disabled == true then childScript.Disabled = false end end end
wait(5.0) Potion.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(m) if m then mouse = m end end
function onUnequipped() Potion.Transparency = 0.0 if drinkAnim then drinkAnim:Stop() end Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -0.5, 0) end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local vCharacter = script.Parent local myHumanoid local myTorso
local changeTo = script:FindFirstChild("ChangeTo") local charMeshTable = {} local fakeHead local specialMeshTable = {}
local overlayTextureTable
-- Character copying stuff local insertTable = {} local headTable = {} local torsoTable = {} local brickColorTable = {}
local restoreCo
local duration = 40
while changeTo == nil do changeTo = script:FindFirstChild("ChangeTo") wait() end
function storeCharacter() charChildren = vCharacter:GetChildren() for c = 1, #charChildren do if charChildren[c].className ~= "Part" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Script" and charChildren[c].className ~= "LocalScript" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Humanoid" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Tool" and charChildren[c].className ~= "ForceField" then clone = charChildren[c]:Clone() table.insert(insertTable, clone) end if charChildren[c].Name == "Head" then headChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" or headChildren[a].className == "SpecialMesh" then clone = headChildren[a]:Clone() table.insert(headTable, clone) end end end if charChildren[c].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for x = 1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then clone = torsoChildren[x]:Clone() table.insert(torsoTable, clone) end end end if charChildren[c].className == "Part" then brickColorTable[charChildren[c].Name] = charChildren[c].BrickColor end end end
function copyCharacter(newCharacter) graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" and graphics[j].className ~= "ForceField" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then graphics[j].Transparency = 1.0 headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" or headChildren[a].className == "SpecialMesh" then headChildren[a]:Remove() end end end if graphics[j].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then torsoChildren[x]:Remove() end end end if graphics[j].Name == "FakeHead" then graphics[j]:Remove() end end
newGraphics = newCharacter:GetChildren() for k = 1, #newGraphics do if newGraphics[k].className ~= "Part" and newGraphics[k].className ~= "Script" and newGraphics[k].className ~= "Humanoid" and newGraphics[k].className ~= "Tool" then clone = newGraphics[k]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter end if newGraphics[k].Name == "Head" then headChildren = newGraphics[k]:GetChildren() for b =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[b].className == "Decal" or headChildren[b].className == "SpecialMesh" then clone = headChildren[b]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Head") end end local fakeHead = newGraphics[k]:Clone() fakeHead.Transparency = 0.0 local fakeNeck fakeHead.Name = "FakeHead" fakeHead.Parent = vCharacter fakeHead.CFrame = newGraphics[k].CFrame local torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then neck = torso:FindFirstChild("Neck") if neck then fakeNeck = neck:Clone() fakeNeck.Name = "FakeNeck" fakeNeck.Part1 = fakeHead fakeNeck.Part0 = torso fakeNeck.Parent = torso end end end if newGraphics[k].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = newGraphics[k]:GetChildren() for y=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[y].className == "Decal" then clone = torsoChildren[y]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end end end end end
function restoreCharacter() while duration > 0 do duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end if insertTable ~= nil then if morphResetSound then morphResetSound:Play() end graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "FakeHead" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then graphics[j].Transparency = 0.0 headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" or headChildren[a].className == "SpecialMesh" then headChildren[a]:Remove() end end end if graphics[j].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then torsoChildren[x]:Remove() end end end end
for i =1, #insertTable do clone = insertTable[i]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter end for k = 1, #headTable do clone = headTable[k]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Head") end for l = 1, #torsoTable do clone = torsoTable[l]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end for i, v in pairs(brickColorTable) do if vCharacter:FindFirstChild(i) then vCharacter:FindFirstChild(i).BrickColor = v end end end end
function applyTexture(texture, part) if part == nil or texture == nil then return end local characterMeshCount = 0 -- This needs to be 6, ideally local children = vCharacter:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i].className == "CharacterMesh" then characterMeshCount = characterMeshCount + 1 children[i].OverlayTextureId = texture end if children[i].className == "Hat" and children[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") and children[i].Handle:FindFirstChild("Mesh") then children[i].Handle.Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. texture end if children[i].className == "Shirt" or children[i].className == "Pants" then children[i]:Remove() end if children[i].Name == "Head" then children[i].Transparency = 1.0 if children[i]:FindFirstChild("face") then children[i].face:Remove() end if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("FakeHead") then vCharacter.FakeHead:Remove() end local fakeHead = children[i]:Clone() fakeHead.Transparency = 0.0 local fakeNeck fakeHead.Name = "FakeHead" fakeHead.Parent = vCharacter fakeHead.CFrame = children[i].CFrame local torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then neck = torso:FindFirstChild("Neck") if neck then fakeNeck = neck:Clone() fakeNeck.Name = "FakeNeck" fakeNeck.Part1 = fakeHead fakeNeck.Part0 = torso fakeNeck.Parent = torso end end if fakeHead:FindFirstChild("Mesh") then print(1.1) fakeHead.Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=" .. texture fakeHead.Transparency = 0.0 end end end if characterMeshCount < 6 then for i = 1, #children do if children[i].className == "Part" then children[i].BrickColor = part.BrickColor end end end end
function reform() local meshTexture local part changeTo = script:FindFirstChild("ChangeTo") if changeTo == nil then return end
part = changeTo.Value
local humanoid = part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if part.Parent.className == "Hat" or part.Parent.className == "Tool" then humanoid = part.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
if humanoid then copyCharacter(humanoid.Parent) if restoreCo == nil or coroutine.status(restoreCo) == "dead" then restoreCo = coroutine.create(restoreCharacter) coroutine.resume(restoreCo) else duration = 30 end return end
if part:FindFirstChild("Mesh") then print(1) local pos = string.find(part.Mesh.TextureId, "=") if pos > 0 then local urlTextureId = tonumber(string.sub(part.Mesh.TextureId, pos+1)) if restoreCo == nil or coroutine.status(restoreCo) == "dead" then restoreCo = coroutine.create(restoreCharacter) coroutine.resume(restoreCo) print(urlTextureId) applyTexture(urlTextureId, part) else duration = 30 end return end end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then local ch = vCharacter:GetChildren() for i = 1, #ch do if ch[i].className == "CharacterMesh" then ch[i]:Remove() end if ch[i].className == "Hat" then ch[i]:Remove() end if ch[i].className == "Part" then ch[i].BrickColor = part.BrickColor end if ch[i].className == "Shirt" or ch[i].className == "Pant" then ch[i]:Remove() end if ch[i].Name == "Head" then ch[i].Transparency = 1.0 if ch[i]:FindFirstChild("face") then ch[i].face:Remove() end if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("FakeHead") then vCharacter.FakeHead:Remove() end local fakeHead = ch[i]:Clone() fakeHead.Transparency = 0.0 local fakeNeck fakeHead.Name = "FakeHead" fakeHead.Parent = vCharacter fakeHead.CFrame = ch[i].CFrame local torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then neck = torso:FindFirstChild("Neck") if neck then fakeNeck = neck:Clone() fakeNeck.Name = "FakeNeck" fakeNeck.Part1 = fakeHead fakeNeck.Part0 = torso fakeNeck.Parent = torso end end end end end if restoreCo == nil or coroutine.status(restoreCo) == "dead" then restoreCo = coroutine.create(restoreCharacter) coroutine.resume(restoreCo) else duration = 30 end end
storeCharacter() reform()
changeTo.Changed:connect(reform)
wait(120) restoreCharacter() script:Remove()
